comment.author: 11217496@N03
comment._content:
amazing history view!
I wonder what those "trucks" doing there in the water?

comment.author: 8296439@N05
comment._content: A similar hut is featured in another shot from the collection: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3438462238/ I live not far from here now. Incredible.

comment.author: 25004766@N06
comment._content: maybe they were changing rooms or shower rooms of that sort.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: See www.victorianweb.org for "bathing wagons," or www.metropostcard.com for "bathing machines." Used for changing clothes and entering the water with utmost modesty.
